Uses of Interface
model.Board

Packages that use Board
Package
Description
model
The model package contains the classes that define the logic and state of the Tic-Tac-Toe game (in progress, invalid move, win, tie).

  • Uses of Board in model

    Classes in model that implement Board
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TicTacToeBoard
    This class represents a Tic-Tac-Toe board and implements the Board interface.

    Description

    ComputerPlayer.fillRandomTile(Board board)
    Utility method for making a random move on the board by filling up a random empty tile.

    Make the first move of the game.

    ComputerPlayer.getTwoInARow(char symbol, Board board)
    Utility method that will get the next move that forms two in a row for the specified symbol, if it exists.
    private int[]
    ComputerPlayer.getWinningMove(char symbol, Board board)
    Utility method that will get the winning move for the specified symbol on the board, if it exists.

    Check if two players tied with each other.
